There are also some bugs such as not looking for a new game after finishing another. However, I understand that they will be corrected as they are reported.

I've been playing since I believe late 2016, and have well over a thousand hours in the game. I think this song summarizes my feelings quite well.


"The House Of The Rising Sun"

There is a house in New Orleans
They call the Rising Sun
And it's been the ruin of many a poor boy
And God, I know I'm one

My mother was a tailor
She sewed my new blue jeans
My father was a gamblin' man
Down in New Orleans

Now the only thing a gambler needs
Is a suitcase and a trunk
And the only time he's satisfied
Is when he's all drunk

Oh mother, tell your children
Not to do what I have done
Spend your lives in sin and misery
In the House of the Rising Sun

Well, I got one foot on the platform
The other foot on the train
I'm goin' back to New Orleans
To wear that ball and chain

Well, there is a house in New Orleans
They call the Rising Sun
And it's been the ruin of many a poor boy
And God, I know I'm one

什么？这不是守望先锋2啊，这是暴雪木琴的古灰盒，体积小方便携带，拆开一包😀，放水里就散开，怎么找都找不回来，用来泡水😋😋，冲厕所，拖地都是很好用的😋😋，你看打开以后像奶茶粉一样碎，放在水里遇水溶解不见，溶解性很强的。冲开以后，是一杯强效加量的洁厕灵，你看它怎么用都用不完，不掉伤手不伤地，使用一辈子都没问题，大扫除带上它非常方便，用它洗袜子，再拖地板，冲厕所，干净卫生。什么?在哪里买?右上角寿衣商店，买一盒送一盒😋😋😋😋😋😋  烤迪克 我草你妈
